message: ...The streets are a maze of revelers, but somehow I manage to make it back to Glitter.
I head straight upstairs and take a few pills.
Then I plop down on the sofa with Ren and just sit.
Once I've calmed down a bit, I try to sort out my thoughts.
First, the news from Mr. Haga.
He said that some kind of music had flooded the streets, and then everyone had become fixated on the broadcast from Platinum Jail.
That music must have been some form of mind control.
It sounded like Granny and the others were safe... but I have no way of confirming that.
I mean, what if something happens while I'm sitting here?

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."
Ren sets a comforting paw on my lap.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sorry."
I need to calm down and think this through.
If Mr. Haga was telling the truth, then everyone should still be safe.
I doubt there's anything I could do if I went home now. And it'd make everything I went through to get here meaningless.
Mr. Haga reminded me not to go it alone. He knows that I can lose sight of the big picture when my blood is up.
The main event starts tomorrow.
I have to get to Toue before that...
I close my eyes and take a deep breath.
But in the darkness, I can see his eyes... Sei's eyes, sparkling like stars.
Toue said that Sei was like a son to him... but who is he, really?
Looking into Sei's eyes, even through a screen, felt like being struck by lightning.
The same thing happened when I saw him in that alley.
And on top of that, the people in the square were so infatuated with him, it was like they were under some kind of spell.
Those eyes... They were so... quiet, like the ocean after a storm.
I have no idea what he is. The only thing I know for sure is that something insane is happening.
I open my eyes and stroke Ren's back.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren."

name: 蓮
message: "Yes?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I think I want to go to the tower tomorrow."

name: 蓮
message: "How do you plan on getting inside?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess just crashing in through the front door... probably won't work."

name: 蓮
message: "It would be difficult."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That leaves..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Well, there is one thing."

name: 蓮
message: "...Aoba. Are you planning to use your power?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You always know what I'm thinking."

name: 蓮
message: "It's dangerous."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But I don't have any other choice. If I don't do something―"

name: 蓮
message: "But what if you do something you regret?"
I know exactly what he means. The last time I used my power...
...I broke Mizuki.
And it might be doing something to me, too.
It's dangerous. Even so...

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't want to lose anyone else. I need to stop this."

name: 蓮
message: "Even if something might happen to you and make Tae and the others sad?"
